subject: VAT to Poland
description_text:
Hello, I want to order your pedals to Poland, and I want to ask where the
shipment is from? Will I have to pay import tax, or is it already
calculated in the price on the site? On the FAQ, I found information that
above 150 euros in tax is not automatically paid, but I have seen that you
ship from Germany and that it will not make me pay VAT. Which one is true?
Regards,
Michal
